entry.string: Your new password has been sent to your email address of record. You will want to change this new password once you have logged in.
entry.translation: Yuoor noo pessvurd hes beee sent tu yuoor imeeel eddress ooff recurd. Yuoo veell vunt tu chunge-a thees noo pessvurd oonce-a yuoo hefe-a lugged in. Bork bork bork!
